Pre-Game Insights: The Mets went 75-87 in 2023 and were 22-33 near the end of May, but they came on strong the rest of the way under new manager Carlos Mendoza to earn the NL's final wild-card spot.
Milwaukee was an even bigger surprise in winning its second straight NL Central title.
The Brewers never flinched. They took over the NL Central lead near the end of April and stayed there the rest of the way.
The Mets figure to start Luis Severino (11-7, 3.91) and Sean Manaea (12-6, 3.47) in the first two games, and then Jose Quintana (10-10, 3.75) would be on full rest for a potential Game 3.
Peralta (11-9, 3.68 ERA) will start Game 1, but Murphy isn't saying how the Brewers will set up their pitching beyond that.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers have won 12 of their last 14 meetings with the Mets.
Much of Milwaukee's success against the Mets has come from its running game.
Milwaukee’s Brice Turang went 9 of 19 and stole seven bases without getting caught in the Brewers’ six regular-season games with the Mets.
Others: Frelick crashed into the right-field sidewall, and his left side made contact with the metal chain link inside a window in that wall with no protective padding.
The Brewers installed new padding to the section of wall that Frelick hit.
